problem_text: One side of a square is a diameter of a circle. The length of one side of the square is 5 feet. To the nearest hundredth, what is the probability that a point chosen at random is in the shaded region?
source: Textbook 2_Chapter 11 - Areas of Polygons and Circles.pdf
